narrativecraft.user.crash.his-fault: A Story Exception has been caught, hover text to know why.
narrativecraft.user.crash.not-his-fault: An Exception occurred, please click the message and create an issue on GitHub!
narrativecraft.user.crash.character_not_: Character "%s" was not found in the world. Check script chapter %s scene %s
narrativecraft.user.first_time:
Hello, and thank you for installing NarrativeCraft! Here's everything you need to know before getting started.
- To open the story manager, press %s.
- To open other managers, use /nc open {manager_name}.
- To write your script, install %s.
To get fully started, visit the documentation: %s
If you have any questions, don't hesitate to join the %s server!
narrativecraft.global.confirm_delete: Are you sure? This can't be undone!
narrativecraft.global.dev_env: Welcome in the development environment! Have fun creating :p
narrativecraft.session.set: Your session is now set to §lChapter %d §rand §lScene %s.
narrativecraft.session.not_set: You need to set the chapter and scene session.
narrativecraft.session.cleared.fail: You don't have a session set.
narrativecraft.story.load.scene.fail: It's impossible to start this scene on its own, as neither the characters nor the cameras have been initialized from the start. Please refer to the documentation.
narrativecraft.story.no_exists: Story file doesn't exist, you need to compile it from Inky. File -> Export to JSON -> name it story.json -> place it on build directory.
narrativecraft.playback.start.fail: Can't start animation %s because no character is assigned.
narrativecraft.scene.no_exists: Scene %s from chapter %s does not exists.
narrativecraft.screen.incompatible-versi:
Warning! This story was made for minecraft version %s and you are running %s.
If you continue, things may not work correctly or even crash your game!
Are you sure to continue?
narrativecraft.screen.crash.title: Whoops! A crash occurred...
narrativecraft.screen.crash.from_mod:
Really sorry! This comes from the mod.
Please, create an issue on github!
narrativecraft.screen.crash.from_story:
Really sorry! This comes from the story.
Send it to the creator of the story.
